summary: Comprehensive testing of Taekwondo competition management - Surclassement features completed successfully. All backend APIs for category seeding, surclassement categories, and competitor creation with surclassement are fully functional. Frontend pages display surclassement badge correctly and the add competitor form includes working surclassement checkbox and category dropdown.

minor.issue: Was limited to 100 results, fixed to 500 to support 126 official categories

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/categories/seed/{competition_id} - creates 126 official FFTA/FFDA categories
Backend: POST /api/categories/seed/{competition_id} - replaces existing categories
Backend: POST /api/categories/seed/{competition_id} - returns 404 for invalid competition
Backend: GET /api/categories/for-surclassement/{competition_id}?sexe=M&age=10 - returns categories for surclassement
Backend: GET /api/categories/for-surclassement/{competition_id}?sexe=F&age=8 - returns female categories
Backend: Surclassement categories are sorted by age_min then poids_min
Backend: POST /api/competiteurs with surclasse=false - auto category assignment works
Backend: POST /api/competiteurs with surclasse=true - manual category selection works
Backend: Surclassement weight validation - rejects incompatible weight
Backend: GET /api/categories/age-groups - returns all 8 official age groups
Backend: Existing test data - Lucas Dupont is marked as surclassé
Backend: Existing test data - Emma Martin has auto-assigned category (not surclassé)
Backend: Existing test data - 126 categories exist for competition
Frontend: Login page loads and authentication works
Frontend: Dashboard shows correct stats (126 categories)
Frontend: Compétiteurs page displays 'Surclassé' badge for Lucas Dupont
Frontend: Compétiteurs page does NOT show 'Surclassé' badge for Emma Martin
Frontend: Add competitor form has surclassement checkbox
Frontend: Surclassement checkbox reveals category dropdown when enabled
Frontend: Surclassement dropdown loads categories based on age and sex
Frontend: Categories page shows 'Catégories officielles' button
Frontend: Categories page displays all 126 official categories
Frontend: All age groups visible (Pupilles, Benjamins, Minimes, Cadets, Juniors, Seniors, Masters)
seed_data_creation: 126 official FFTA/FFDA categories seeded for competition comp_535694c8e8dc. 2 test competitors: Lucas Dupont (surclassé in Cadets) and Emma Martin (auto-assigned to Minimes)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All surclassement features are working correctly. The categories endpoint was fixed to return up to 500 results instead of 100. Test file test_surclassement_features.py contains comprehensive tests for all new endpoints.

frontend_surclassement_form.includes: Checkbox and category dropdown for surclassement
